verses.verse: It happened <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4194>death<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> when <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H7725>returned<s%> from the <S%H5221>slaughter<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites,<s%> and <S%H1732>David<s%> had <S%H3427>stayed<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in <S%H6860>Ziklag;<s%>

it happened on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H376>behold,<s%> a man <S%H935>came<s%> out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> from <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> with his <S%H899>clothes<s%> <S%H7167>torn,<s%> and <S%H127>earth<s%> on his <S%H7218>head:<s%> and so it <S%H935>was,<s%> when he came to <S%H1732>David,<s%> that he <S%H5307>fell<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and showed <S%H7812>respect.<s%>
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H935>him,<s%> "Where do you come <S%H559>from?<s%>" He said to <S%H4422>him,<s%> "I have escaped out of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4100>him,<s%> "How did it <S%H1697>go?<s%> Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H559>me.<s%>" He answered, "The <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H5127>fled<s%> from the <S%H4421>battle,<s%> and <S%H7235>many<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> also have <S%H5307>fallen<s%> and are <S%H4191>dead;<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> are dead <S%H4191>also.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> who <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H3045>him,<s%> "How do you know that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> are <S%H4191>dead?<s%>"

The young <S%H5288>man<s%> who <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H5046>said,<s%> "As I <S%H7136>happened<s%> by <S%H7122>chance<s%> on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H1533>Gilboa,<s%> <S%H7586>behold,<s%> Saul was <S%H8172>leaning<s%> on his <S%H2595>spear;<s%> and <S%H7393>behold,<s%> the chariots and the <S%H1167>horsemen<s%> followed hard after <S%H1692>him.<s%>
When he <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> <S%H6437>him,<s%> he saw <S%H7121>me,<s%> and called to <S%H559>me.<s%> I answered, 'Here I am.'
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>me,<s%> 'Who are you?' I answered <S%H6003>him,<s%> 'I am an Amalekite.'
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5975>me,<s%> 'Please stand beside <S%H4191>me,<s%> and kill <S%H7661>me;<s%> for anguish has <S%H270>taken<s%> hold of <S%H5315>me,<s%> because my life is yet whole in me.'

So I <S%H5975>stood<s%> beside <S%H4191>him,<s%> and killed <S%H3045>him,<s%> because I was sure that he could not <S%H2421>live<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> that he had <S%H5307>fallen.<s%> I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H5145>crown<s%> that was on his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and the <S%H685>bracelet<s%> that was on his <S%H2220>arm,<s%> and have <S%H935>brought<s%> them here to my <S%H113>lord.<s%>"
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> took <S%H2388>hold<s%> on his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> and <S%H7167>tore<s%> <S%H582>them;<s%> and likewise all the men who were with him.

They <S%H5594>mourned,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept,<s%> and <S%H6684>fasted<s%> until <S%H6153>evening,<s%> for <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> and for <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and for the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> because they were <S%H5307>fallen<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the young <S%H5288>man<s%> who <S%H559>told<s%> <S%H559>him,<s%> "Where are you from?" He answered, "I am the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H376>foreigner,<s%> an <S%H6003>Amalekite.<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3372>him,<s%> "How were you not afraid to put <S%H7971>forth<s%> your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed?<s%>"

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> of the young <S%H5288>men,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Go <S%H5066>near,<s%> and <S%H6293>fall<s%> on <S%H5221>him.<s%>" He struck <S%H4191>him,<s%> so that he died.

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1818>him,<s%> "Your blood be on your <S%H7218>head;<s%> for your <S%H6310>mouth<s%> has <S%H6030>testified<s%> against <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H4191><s%> 'I have slain <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H4899>anointed.<s%>'"
<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> with this <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H7586>Saul<s%> and over <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>

(and he <S%H559>commanded<s%> them to <S%H3925>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> the song of the <S%H7198>bow:<s%> <S%H3789>behold,<s%> it is written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3477>Jashar<s%>):
"Your <S%H6643>glory,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> is <S%H2491>slain<s%> on your high <S%H1116>places!<s%> How the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> have <S%H5307>fallen!<s%>

<S%H5046>Don't<s%> tell it in <S%H1661>Gath.<s%> <S%H1319>Don't<s%> publish it in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> lest the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H8055>rejoice,<s%> lest the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> <S%H5937>triumph.<s%>

You <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H1533>Gilboa,<s%> let there be no <S%H2919>dew<s%> nor <S%H4306>rain<s%> on <S%H7704>you,<s%> neither fields of <S%H8641>offerings;<s%> For there the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> was vilely cast <S%H1602>away,<s%> The <S%H4043>shield<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> was not <S%H4899>anointed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil.<s%>

From the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of the <S%H2491>slain,<s%> from the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H1368>mighty,<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%>'s <S%H7198>bow<s%> <S%H7734>didn't<s%> turn <S%H268>back.<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H7725>didn't<s%> return <S%H7387>empty.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> were <S%H157>lovely<s%> and <S%H5273>pleasant<s%> in their <S%H2416>lives.<s%> In their <S%H4194>death,<s%> they were not <S%H6504>divided.<s%> They were <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5404>eagles.<s%> They were <S%H1396>stronger<s%> than <S%H738>lions.<s%>

You <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> weep <S%H1058>over<s%> <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> who <S%H3847>clothed<s%> you in <S%H8144>scarlet<s%> <S%H5730>delicately,<s%> who <S%H5927>put<s%> <S%H5716>ornaments<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> on your <S%H3830>clothing.<s%>
How are the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H5307>fallen<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H4421>battle!<s%> <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> is <S%H2491>slain<s%> on your high <S%H1116>places.<s%>

I am <S%H6887>distressed<s%> for <S%H251>you,<s%> my brother <S%H3083>Jonathan.<s%> You have been <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H5276>pleasant<s%> to <S%H160>me.<s%> Your love to me was <S%H6381>wonderful,<s%> passing the <S%H160>love<s%> of <S%H802>women.<s%>
How are the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> and the <S%H3627>weapons<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> <S%H6>perished!<s%>"
